thread.title: The Rising Storm That Froze Baseball’s Hot Stove Market

author: Jared Diamond
title: The Rising Storm That Froze Baseball’s Hot Stove Market

organizations.name: hot stove market major league baseball

text:
Major League Baseball celebrated the conclusion of one of the most exciting World Series in recent memory three months ago, a seven-game thriller that showcased the sport. Much of the conversation revolved around the ingenuity of the Houston Astros, who fielded a noncompetitive roster for several years in order to build the first championship team in franchise history.
But with spring training barely a week away and dozens of established veterans still searching for work, a rising storm threatens to derail nearly a quarter-century...
